H0.text: Pyruvate is the end product of glycolysis.

H1.text: Fructose is the end product of glycolysis.

H2.text: Gluclose is the end product of glycolysis.

H3.text: Hydrolysis is the end product of glycolysis.

A4.text: In the last step of glycolysis, phosphoenolpyruvate (PEP) is converted to pyruvate by pyruvate kinase.

A5.text: It is the output of the metabolism of glucose known as glycolysis.
